description:
If a MaxRetriesExceeded exception is raised by scheduler_utils.populate_retry then request_spec will be undefined in the exception handler, see: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/tree/nova/conductor/manager.py#n422

This was introduced by moving the initialization of request_spec inside the try block in https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/nova/conductor/manager.py?id=399f3abbf9da6ba9f3ae83650513616b151420cb

Simply moving the initialization of request_spec up one line before the call to populate_retry should fix the issue.
title: ComputeTaskManager.build_instances exception handling can fail
